function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through urban areas due to rapid population growth and increased global connectivity.","Impact":"Massive setbacks and challenges like those witnessed during the COVID-19 pandemic.","Mitigation":"Enhanced data collection and computation methods for monitoring and addressing contagious diseases.","Technologies":"AI, crowd computing, Big Data, 6G wireless connectivity.","People":"Global population living in urban areas.","Owner":"Government organizations, public health agencies, and technology companies."}]}
